intro: Viscaria alba, commonly known as the white sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial that typically thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant features small, white, star-shaped flowers that bloom in clusters during the summer months.
